newsitem.title: LATVIA: BOURSE DELAYS LAUNCH OF NEW INDEX.
newsitem.headline: BOURSE DELAYS LAUNCH OF NEW INDEX.

text.p: The Latvian stock exchange on Tuesday said that the launch of its new index will not take place on April 2 as planned.
A bourse spokeswoman said the delay to the launch was due to the need to refine the way the index will be calculated.
But she told Reuters that the methodology and the composition of the index will still be announced on April 2.
She could not give a date for when the bourse index will start working.
The only indices which cover the stock exchange at the moment are those of Rietumu Bank and Saules Bank.
